title: A Bridge of Her Own
description: It has been said that the hardest thing in life is to know which bridge to cross and which to burn. Jane Martin thinks she has it all figured out. She has just graduated from University and is expecting a proposal from her perfect boyfriend Wyatt. What happens when all of this goes away? Finally finding her feet again she meets Gabe, everything seems great until Wyatt comes back into her life unexpectedly. What will she do?
author: Carey Heywood
